==Profile==
They jumped [[Sadife]] thinking he would have treasure to steal, instead with it just being [[Sumeru Akademiya]] research objects with only taking the rock samples Sadife had thinking they'd be valuable.

===Appearance===
He takes on the appearance of a [[Treasure Hoarders: Pyro Potioneer|Pyro Potioneer]].
